title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 21.4 - Authorized means and methods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 21.4 - Authorized means and methods

State Regulations
(See section
21.3, subd. [b], supra.) The
following means and methods are authorized for window cleaning as hereinafter
set forth: (a) working from safe
surfaces. (b) Working from window
sills or ledges. (c) Working from
ladders. (d) Working from
boatswain's chairs. (e) Working
from scaffolds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
21.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
